participant_1.background:
I am a welder who is passionate about the craft and is always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
i am engaged.
i have two border collies.
My friends are the people I can be myself with and who support me no matter what.
i was drafted last years by the minnesota wolves.

participant_2.background:
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i have 3 cats.
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my favourite food is ice cream.

content.text: Hello! I'm glad to meet you.
Hello there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just hanging out with my two border collies.
Oh that sounds fun! I have 3 cats, and they're a handful.
I know what you mean, but they're so cute. What are their names?
Their names are Mittens, Whiskers, and Snowball.
Those are great names! I love cats.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a graphic designer. I love my job, but it can be a lot of work.
Oh cool! I'm a welder, and I love my job too. It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
I bet it is! I've always thought welding would be a cool job.
It's a lot of fun! And it's really rewarding.
Ice cream! I could eat it every day.
I'm glad we have something else in common.
